text:
e="preserve">Abdul Moshabbir (-28 November 2018) Politician of Habiganj district of Bangladesh, Lawyer And elected a member of parliament from Habiganj-1.
Birth and early life.
Abdul Moshabbir was born in 1938 in Srimatpur village of Kaliar Bhanga Union in Nabiganj upazila of Habiganj district of Sylhet Division.
Career.
Moshabbir is a lawyer who was the president of Habiganj District Awami Bar Association. He was the president of Habiganj district bar and general secretary of the district bar. He was elected to parliament from Habiganj-1 as a Jatiya Samajtantrik Dal (JASAD) In 1988 Bangladeshi general election.
He lost the Jatiya Sangsad elections of 1991 Habiganj-1 constituency with the nomination of Jatiya Samajtantrik Dal-JSD.
Death.
Abdul Moshabbir died in 28 November 2018 in Habiganj.
